channel.title: My npcs wont attack back! help!
channel.description: Please help me. When someone attacks an npc in my server it will hit you one time and then not hit you anymore. I need it to keep hitting you. What do I have to do and edit? I'm not the best coder either. I already searched on the forums here for the solution and I checked on Google. If you end up do finding it..Don't just post here "I searched it in the search bar and it popped up..check before you post" and then lock the thread. If you do find it please post it here. I need it.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 08, 2008, 12:52:17 am[/size][hr]ok..ive waited 3 days and still nothing..im bumping my thread

item.title: My npcs wont attack back! help!
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Please help me. When someone attacks an npc in my server it will hit you one time and then not hit you anymore. I need it to keep hitting you. What do I have to do and edit?
